4301810.name: The Order Of Serenity : Cult Simulator
4301810.description:
The Order Of Serenity is a psychological horror simulation where devotion, routine, and obedience shape your fate. You play as a young investigative journalist who infiltrates a secret cult to uncover the truth behind its practices. You are not a hero. You are an observer forced to become a participant.

Under the guise of a new recruit, you must blend in, follow orders, and avoid suspicion. Each day, the Order assigns you tasks. At first, they seem ordinary and harmless. Over time, these duties grow more disturbing, blurring the line between investigation and indoctrination.

The game focuses on atmosphere, tension, and moral discomfort rather than combat. Through repetitive rituals, strict schedules, and subtle psychological pressure, The Order Of Serenity explores how control is established and how obedience slowly replaces doubt.


As you rise through the ranks, you gain access to restricted areas, confidential information, and the inner circle of the cult. Your investigation deepens, but so does the risk. Every action is monitored. Every choice can either bring you closer to the truth or expose your true intentions.

Your goal is to uncover the secrets of the Order without losing yourself in the process.

Key Features

• Psychological horror driven by atmosphere and moral tension

• Narrative focused on infiltration and investigation

• Daily task based gameplay inspired by cult routines and control systems

• Rank and hierarchy progression within the Order

• Player choices that affect trust, access, and outcomes

• Minimalist mechanics designed to create unease and immersion

• Single player experience with a slow, oppressive pacing
